title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1151.2 - Reckless endangerment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1151.2 - Reckless endangerment

State Regulations

No person while at any transportation facility shall
recklessly engage in conduct which creates a substantial risk of serious
physical injury to another person. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1151.2

Amended, New

York State Register May 14, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 19, eff. 5/14/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
